title: Trick or Treat Ekko Pls
body:
Alrighty. 
I’m gonna start by saying this is the only skin I’ve had my eye on for the longest time (since I saw it in a video on FB).
I just recently started playing Ekko but I am in love with everything about him, though I wouldn’t say I’m a godlike player just yet. 
I found that today patch 8.21, and Trick or Treat Ekko, is available. So I rushed into LoL to go buy it, but I can’t. 
I am (im)patiently waiting for it to be out to buy, but I have no clue why it isn’t now. 
It’s under Ekko’s skins on LoL, and I can see it but can’t purchase it with the RP I’ve been saving forever. 
I’m sure it will be out to buy soon, but can someone - anyone - tell me why it isn’t available to buy now? 
Thank you very very much if you help me out!

~Maƒçi

P.S. Btw any Ekko tips are welcome here haha.
